mapper.update: update app_recurring_bank_cr_fa set recurring_bank_cr_fa_id = #{recurringBankCrFaId}, recurring_bank_cash_receive_id = #{recurringBankCashReceiveId}, account_no = #{accountNo}, department_id = #{departmentId}, amount = #{amount}, job_order_no = #{jobOrderNo} where recurring_bank_cr_fa_id = #{recurringBankCrFaId};
